page.title: 03LEIGH SINTON C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is used for education. At the moment there are about 60 pupils. Some of them live out side the village but most of them live in the village. The ages are from 5 to 11 years old. The school is very old. It was built in 1885. Now it is a hundred years old.Most children who live in the village came to the school. At the school we do maths and english and in the 3rd and 4th year we do french. In the 4th year we have homework twice a week.In the 3rd year we have homework one time a week. We do sports on Monday and Thursday.We have a playhouse for the young pupils.We have swimming on Thursday.We give badges out on Friday.They are Merit and Courtesy. The school has close links with St.Edburga's Church,Leigh and the Rector is a frequent visitor and chairs the board of Governors.
